程序包 com.virtualbankv2.control

类 TransactionManager

java.lang.Object
com.virtualbankv2.control.TransactionManager
public class TransactionManager extends Object
This class handles the logic for transferring money between accounts and recording the transactions.
从以下版本开始:
2024-04-24
版本:
3.0
作者:
Zhenghan Zhong

  • 方法详细资料

    • transfer

      public boolean transfer(Account sourceAccount, Account targetAccount, double amount, String description)
      Transfers money from a source account to a target account.
      参数:
      sourceAccount - The account from which money is withdrawn.
      targetAccount - The account to which money is deposited.
      amount - The amount of money to transfer.
      description - The description of the transaction.
      返回:
      true if the transfer is successful, false otherwise.

    • getFormatTransactionID

      public String getFormatTransactionID()
      Generates a formatted transaction ID.
      返回:
      The formatted transaction ID as a string.

    • filterTransactionsByAccount

      public List<Transaction> filterTransactionsByAccount(Account account)
      Filters transactions to find those involving a specific account.
      参数:
      account - The account for which transactions are to be filtered.
      返回:
      A list of transactions involving the specified account.
